frameDefinitions: A State_of_affairs is evaluated as good (or bad), against a background assumption that previously, the State_of_affairs was thought to be unlikely to occur.

A State_of_affairs (a state or event) either holds or occurs, and is presented as being causally independent of other (implicit) states or events that might otherwise have been expected to be causally related to the State_of_affairs.
This frame concerns people being in an altered mental state that is induced by an Intoxicant.
A Producer produces a Product from a Resource for commercial purposes. '
The words in this frame have to do with people and the personal Relationships they are or can be a part of.
This frame characterizes the likelihood that a Hypothetical_event will happen as a position on a scale of impossible to inevitable.
frameExamples: That they got the same answers is just a <t>coincidence</t>.
They <t>produced</t> only half of the units after an injunction to follow the environmental policy.
And of course that drippy <t><fex name='Partner_1'>boyfriend</fex></t> of hers backed her up.
listRoleDefinitions: The State of affairs that is evaluated.
The Protagonist is the one for whom the destiny is evaluated.
The <fen>Role</fen> filled by the <fen>Protagonist</fen>.
The time for which the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s destiny is good.
The location where the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has luck.
A <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> (that is, an event or state) that holds independently of (potentially) causally-related States of affairs.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> holds.
The <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> holds.
The mental state of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is changed by an <fen>Intoxicant</fen> .
The <fen>Intoxicant</fen> alters the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s mental experience.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> becomes intoxicated.
The person or company that produces the Product.
The <fen>Product</fen> is produced by the <fen>Producer</fen>.
<fen>Factory</fen> identifies the particular plant where the <fen>Product</fen> is manufactured.
This Fe identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the product was produced.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Product</fen> is manufactured.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is realized as the subject of verbs in active form sentences, or of adjectives in predicative uses.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is not expressed as the external argument.
The joint construal of both <fen>Partners</fen> in the <fen>Relationship</fen>.
A numerical representation of the probability that a Hypothetical_event will occur.
A metaphorical representation of the position on the scale of likelihood that the Hypothetical_event will occur.
The event that is expected to happen with a certain likelihood.
listRoleExamples: I was rather fortunate <fex>in the late 90s</fex>, making much of my fortune at that time.
Is it a coincidence <fex>that most of the planets fall within the Titius-Bode law's boundaries</fex>?
<fex>Last night's</fex> coincidences were too much for me to handle.
Several strange coincidences <fex>at the airport</fex> got the attention of federal officials.
Those machines were manufactured <fex>in the Miami plant</fex>.
Those leather shoes were made <fex>in Italy</fex>.
There's a <fex>95 %</fex> chance of rain today.
Chances are <fex>slim</fex> that he'll pull through.
He's got a small chance <fex>of making it out alive</fex>.
